alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 4:44AM AKST until February 04 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and periods of freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Ice accumulations less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Gustavus, and Hoonah. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of snow and mixed precipitation is ongoing across the Icy Strait Corridor through Friday. Expect areas near sea level to transition to rain through Friday morning. Confidence is low regarding the exact timing of the change over to rain. An earlier or later transition time may effect total snowfall amounts at sea level.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
